boardgame.name: Antics!
boardgame.description: Antics! is the 2010 Essen release by Fragor Games. You play an ant colony. Prey and leaves abound nearby - if only those other ants would not take what is rightfully yours. Players attempt to have their ants bring back prey and leaves to their anthill. Only the best ant colony will survive and the winner proclaimed The Ant Queen._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Gameplay is straightforward yet rich in challenging decisions. Do you concentrate on building your ant-hill only to discover that others have got to the food before you ? Or do you go and grab the food only to find yourself outpowered towards the end of the game ?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game is for 3-4 players, ages 10+ and lasts for 60 minutes. It features Fragor_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;ant-hill system_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; - a revolutionary new game mechanic._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Get carried away this Essen..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Reserved - possibly:) A buyer from out of the country asked for a shipping quote - I will reserve it until I get a definite answer. I have the replacement brown ants. Two of the original colors of ants were so similar that it was very hard to tell them apart. I sent away to Fragor Games to get the replacements. I removed the outer shrinkwrap to include the brown ants in the game box. But the components have not been punched, the game has not been played and the box is in mint condition. I bought this game when I thought an official 2-player variant was going to be published. No 2-player game variant ever materialized, so the game was never played. Comes from a smoke-free home.

The game: Fragor Games (c) 2010. English and German rules included! All game materials are still in mint condition. Shipping: All shipping is done via DHL. Shipping costs depend on size and weight of the parcel and destination. Payment: Within EU I prefer the EU-standard-bank-tranfer (SEPA,IBAN/BIC). It is fast and causes no fees. Outside EU Paypal and bank-transfer are possible.
